name: MHTOCSMMConditionsLacerationsPerinealTraumaOASIS
title: MH TOC Conditions Lacerations, Perineal, Trauma, and OASIS
description: The MH TOC Conditions Lacerations, Perineal, Trauma, and OASIS Profile is derived from the MH TOC Conditions Profile. This derived profile specifies laceration, perineal, trauma, and Obstetric anal sphincter injury (OASIS) events related to postpartum clinical care by binding to an extension, ValueSet, and CodeSystem.
